title: Indian economy expanded by 8.4% in final three months of 2023
summary: India's economy showed remarkable growth in Q4 2023, with GDP rising 8.4% year-over-year, driven primarily by strong manufacturing performance according to official government data.
content:
A boom in manufacturing helped propel India's economy to significant growth in the October to December quarter of 2023, with annual GDP expanding 8.4% compared to the same period in 2022, according to official government figures.

The impressive growth rate underscores India's position as one of the world's fastest-growing major economies, outpacing other large nations. Manufacturing played a key role in this expansion, demonstrating the country's increasing industrial capacity.

The GDP figures exceeded most economists' expectations and suggest strong domestic demand and industrial activity despite global economic headwinds.

markdown_content:
## Economic Performance

Manufacturing boom propelled India's economy to significant growth in the October to December quarter of 2023, with annual GDP expanding 8.4% compared to the same period in 2022, according to official government figures.

The impressive growth rate underscores India's position as one of the world's fastest-growing major economies, outpacing other large nations. Manufacturing played a key role in this expansion, demonstrating the country's increasing industrial capacity.

The GDP figures exceeded most economists' expectations and suggest strong domestic demand and industrial activity despite global economic headwinds.
